pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a construction site featuring several tall buildings and cranes against a partly cloudy sky. As the camera pans left, more of the construction site and the surrounding buildings come into view, including a partially constructed building in the foreground. The sun is setting in the background, casting a warm glow over the scene. The camera continues to move left, revealing more of the construction site and the buildings, with the sky transitioning from blue to a mix of orange and yellow hues.
